string.text: {=ZPaw3WuO}The Galactic Republic, also known as the Grand Republic or simply as the Republic, was a democratic union comprised of various member worlds spread across light-years of space.

{=ZPaw3WuO}The Confederacy was founded from a belief of excessive taxation and corruption within the Republic's Galactic Senate, as well as a general feeling of dissatisfaction towards and neglect by the Republic-centric Core Worlds region of the galaxy.

{=ZPaw3WuO}The Mandalorians were a clan-based cultural group that was composed of members from multiple species all bound by a common creed, language and code. They originated on the desert planet of Mandalore in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories and had a particularly important role in galactic history as legendary warriors against the Jedi. From their homeworld, Mandalorians had flourished across Mandalorian Space and the galaxy at large.
